full_summary:
### ISO Container Lifting Systems (ICLS) Solicitation

**government Tender Submission**

**tl;dr:** Ministry of National Defence (DND) is seeking proposals to deliver 58 ISO Container Lifting Systems (ICLS) to various Canadian Forces Bases (CFBs) across Canada. Submission of bids is via electronic email transmission only.

**Details:**

The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement to procure 58 ISO Container Lifting Systems (ICLS) and Integrated Logistics Support for delivery to multiple Canadian Forces Bases (CFBs) across Canada. The delivery date for all associated goods and services is expected to be 730 days from the awarding of the contract.

The Canadian government retains the right to negotiate any procurement agreement with suppliers. The tender is open to proposals from qualified suppliers, irrespective of nationality, accepted language (English or French). 

**Procurement Documents:** All documents related to this procurement will be issued through the Canada's procurement portal [CanadaBuys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/19/c3b760933d2b97671e239b601030478a/en_rfp_w8476-226568-a_original.pdf).

**Submission Requirements:**

* Only electronic submission of bids via email will be accepted.
* The subject of the email should contain the reference number (**W8476-226568**).
* Bids must be sent to the following email address: **DLP53BidsReceiving@forces.gc.ca**

**Time Schedule:**

* Closing date for tenders: January 17th, 2023 at 2:00 PM (Eastern Standard Time)
* Follow-up communications (if necessary) regarding bidding status will not be made after the tender closing date.

**Trade Agreements:**

Suppliers are reminded that Canada's Trade Agreements apply to this procurement. Suppliers must ensure that their proposal conforms to Canada's Trade Agreements, including agreements with the United States, Mexico, Chile, Peru, Colombia, Panama, Honduras, the European Union, and other partner countries.

**Language Requirements:**

The procurement function of DND has the right to make any corrections deemed necessary before awarding contract in either official language of Canada. Some documents/Files may be received in French or English.

**Additional Contacts:**

In case more information is required, please contact:

* **Contact Information:** Wo Il Lee
* Email: **woil.lee@forces.gc.ca**
*
